G 4GGG 7 Creature - Zombie Creature 12/6
2 Reach, trample You may look at the top card of your library any time. Whenever Rock-Throwing Tank attacks, you may put a permanent card from your hand or the top of your library onto the battlefield.

W 2WW // 5WW 4 Enchantment - Room // Enchantment
1 When you unlock this door, create four 1/1 red Human Survivor creature tokens. --- Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have lifelink.

B 1B 2 Legendary Creature - Human Survivor Creature 2/2
2 Menace 1B, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. 4BBBB, {T}, Sacrifice Bill, the Sacrifice: Destroy all creatures you don’t control.

U 1U // 4UU 2 Enchantment - Room // Enchantment
1 At the beginning of your end step, target player mills two cards. (They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.) --- At the beginning of your first main phase, until end of turn, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback {0}.

3 3 Artifact - Equipment Artifact
